column1: // Template to use to generate secrets.csv for each environment
// For now each engineer is storing local copies of secrets.csv that we don't check into version
// control. This is enforced via .gitignore. We compile secrets.csv into our binary.
// The URLs for this secret file's environment. They are used as redirect URLs in our OAuth apps.
// Keys and secrets for our OAuth apps used in this environment.
// The auth code for our test account so we don't need to regenerate it.
// The NSID for our user with creds stored in the store for easier testing
